meanings.definition: A board placed at the bottom of a vehicle to prevent splashing.
meanings.sent1: The splashboards on the truck kept the mud from splashing onto the road.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic installed new splashboards under the car to avoid splashing water on the road.
meanings.sent3: When the splashboards on the bus broke, it looked like a water fountain on wheels!
meanings.sent4: Her skateboard became her trusty splashboard, protecting her from the muddy puddles.
meanings.sent5: The splashboards on the boat were like shields against the waves, keeping the passengers dry.

meanings.definition: A board used to protect walls from splashes of water or other liquids.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen splashboards shielded the walls from grease splashes while cooking.
meanings.sent2: She wiped the water off the splashboards near the sink to keep the walls clean.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the splashboards were a fun obstacle course to avoid water spills.
meanings.sent4: The colorful splashboards in the art studio caught the paint splatters like a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The bathroom splashboards were like guardians, defending the walls from shower splashes.
